name: The Cardiac Effect
description:
Trapped in an empty hospital with no recollection of how you got there, you must make your way out. However, you are stuck to your life support and can only go as far as the outlets on the wall will let you. You must disconnect yourself and use your ghost form to traverse through the levels and make your way to the elevator to escape.

Move - WASD

Disconnect - [SPACE]

Reconnect - [LMB]

Interact - [LMB]
